overview:
Xavier Aubry is a French entrepreneur based in Sweden, with a background in life sciences, software and telecommunications.

He is the Founder and CEO of Appear, a mobile software vendor based in Stockholm, Sweden, which he started in 2001, as a spin-off from the final stage of the Harvard Business School business plan contest.

Prior to Appear, Xavier Aubry was the COO of a French technology start-up, where he managed product development, worldwide sales & marketing, and led the company into new markets in Europe, Asia, and the US.

Xavier Aubry has also served as a board member of Tagmaster, supplier of RFID technologies quoted on the Stockholm Stock Exchange First North (TAGM B). He is also a regular speaker at entrepreneurial marketing courses in Sweden’s startup network (STING Startup and Go Global programs).

Xavier Aubry holds an MBA from Harvard Business School with high distinction.
